item.title: IT contractor guidelines
item.description: External Computer Applications Requirements All external contractor applications should be able to run under a Linux based Kubernetes cluster. Contractor must be able to setup and update an inhouse git repository https://git.imim.cat with all needed Kubernetes deployment files Hardware
